HORACE B. POWELL
PUBLICATIONS DIRECTOR
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
March 31, 1959
Dr. Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
l4 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Hill:
Thank you very much for your letter of March 30 conveying the
pictogram concerning National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters radio.
We think this is a very handsome piece of art work and contem¬
plate using it as the central illustration for the featurette
concerning your Association.
Yes, we have the photographs from St. Louis and Chicago. The
St. Louis picture was used by us for our 1958 Annual Report
and we are returning this particular picture to you at this
time. With your permission we will retain the Chicago picture
until after this year's Annual Report is issued and will return
it together with the pictogram at that time.
While I have not yet started to write the featurette, through
your good offices and those of Dr. Skornia,I believe I have all
the material and information necessary. Thank you, indeed, for
your continued cooperation.
